message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value you'll be getting.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is quite a bit below what I'm hoping for. Could you do $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to go above $100 for the product. Would you consider $100?
